name: Lazer Snakez
description:
In this 80s arcade style game you play as a snake trapped in a maze growing longer and longer avoiding obstacles like the maze, yourself and sentient Ai laser snake robots. Can you make the score board?

With new infinite possibilities with improved 2.0 Ai pathfinding and procedurally generated maps for a unique new experience every game.

All code is original and programmed by Niall O'Reilly without outsourcing or libraries this gives a better understanding of how the game works and makes it easier to update so please comment as constructive feedback is always welcome. The simplistic art is also designed by Niall O'Reilly.

With sound effects from sfxr.exe and retro themed music from Mega Murray 64 we hope to bring you a fast paced embracive experience to give you a challenging nostalgic feeling.
